lines.text: You're a girl!
You've seen one before haven't you?
[Håkon is rescuing Mary from a native tribe]
Håkon! Håkon, I knew you were alive!
This is no time for a reunion.
This is so stupid. I'm the one that should go. Hakon you know the island best and Jens you know everything else.
It's too dangerous.
I sneaked on board your ship while you were standing guard.
I believe her.
Have you ever used a gun before.
I think I can handle myself.
You wait till my father gets home. He'll show you.
You're father's not coming back. He's lost at sea.
He is not!
He owes my father so much money, He'd be better off lost.
[the crew is playing a trick on Håkon]
That's enough.
Just like you Jens. Ruin all the fun.
I remember when the trick was played on you Bosun but your pants were too wet to pull down!
What are you doing here?
I'm going to Calcutta. Same as you.
Why?
To get away from some busy-bodies who want to put me in an orphanage, alright?
Why don't you just live with your parents?
Because I'm an orphan. If you must know. Why else do you think they'd put me in an orphanage?
What's Xanadu?
My Mother said it was the most beautiful place on Earth. Where everybody was happy. But it's only in a book it doesn't really exist.
Yes it does.
I want whoever did this dead. I want my treasure! I want every rock, every hole, every tree on this island searched.
I thought I'd never see you again. I thought I'd never see anybody again.
Every ship has it's secrets.
Now you listen here to me, boy. And you listen good. I'm gonna count to three and when I do you're gonna tell me where my treasure is. Cause if you don't, I'm gonna blow your head off.
Officer Howell.
Merrick?
Yes, it's me.
Impossible. Merrick died.
The British Navy did its best, but I'm still alive, my friend.
[as they leave a booby-trapped cave]
It's a miracle you ever got out of there alive.
I nearly didn't.
They don't pay a man who is laid up in his bunk. I have come to ask that... If you would extend my loan.
How bad is your leg?
It doesn't look like I'll be going back to sea.
Then I don't see how I can extend your loan any longer.
I just want to be a true sailor.
I've never known a truer.
Tell me, your father is a big man. Why are you so puny?
A knot like this could cost a man his life!
